body.name: 2024 WiFi Extender Signal Booster, 4X Faster Longest Range Internet Booster Up to 9980 Sq.Ft for Home, Wireless Repeater with Ethernet Port, Easy Setup, Wide Compatibility with Network Devices
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 34 mins
features: Eliminate Wi-Fi Dead Zones: UPPOON home internet extenders boosts your wifi signal covers up to 9980 sq.ft and 50 devices with 4 high-gain antennas, which can fix the dead zone. Sending your router network signal to every corner of your house

Easy Set Up: Press the WPS button on routers, then press WPS on wifi boosters to quickly connect in 30 seconds. You can also choose to use your mobile phone or PC to setup as we provide an quick installation guide that can easy-to-follow. No need to repeat the settings after a power failure by virtue of the power failure memory.

Ultra Speed Network: 2024 wi fi range extender equipped 2.4Ghz ultra-core processor and 4 high-gain antennas maximize your network quality and reduce the loss of data transmission, allowing you to enjoy fast and stable data transmission for Video Streaming, 4K Videos, Games at home

Advanced Security Features: Supports advanced wireless security encryption (WPA/WPA2 PSK), effectively prevent external malicious interference and avoid all unauthorized access, keep strangers and hackers outside. The contemporary design serves as a custom vent feature for improved heat. Features a sleek and compact design that blends seamlessly into your walls and decor

Universal Compatibility: Choose Repeater / Bridge / Client / Access Point or Router Mode to capture all your internet needs; Compatible with 99% of routers and devices on the market. You can then keep a strong connection with Mobile Phone, Smart TV, Garage Doors, Doorbell, Cameras etc. Experience wired speed and reliability anywhere in your home by connecting your network device to the Ethernet port of the wireless booster
OUR TEAM PROVIDE 7*24 H TECHNICAL SUPPORT AND 18 MONTHS AS A RETURN/REPLACEMENT WARRANTY

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2024 WIFI EXTENDER - ENHANCE YOUR WIFI EXPERIENCE UPGRADE YOUR WIFI EXPERIENCE WITH UPPOON WI-FI RANGE EXTENDER Connects wirelessly to your existing wifi router to boost wi-fi coverage, expand its signal strength to areas never before reached. Enjoy reliable wi-fi coverage throught your home or office without worrying about low signal zones.
HIGH SPEED MODE FOR MAXIMIZED PERFORMANCE Provides stable WiFi for your smart home devices like security cameras, video doorbells, smart bulbs and garage openers.

ENJOYING SMOOTH INTERNET SPEED WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Extender at a Wonderful price!
reviews.reviewText: I decided to purchase an inexpensive WiFi extender because I am on a budget but need to work from home. I gave this little device a try because it looked easy to use..just plug it in.....and it works. Well, a little configuration was needed but the set up was so easy! The instructions are well written and there is even a video you can watch. I liked it so much I bought a second one. I learned that you need a little more configuration if you place two on your network, but also discovered this little device does more than just WiFi extending. It can be you primary WiFi Access Point by just plugging it into your Internet Modem. I highly recommend this product and suggest you try it out. Why spend hundreds at other stores....Its right here, just plug it in,.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received this extender today. So easy to set it up WPS method. I had it up and running in less than 5 minutes. Also like the ability to name the extender yourself. I definitely would recommend this to anyone. For the price, ease of setup, and the performance that it has.

reviews.reviewerName: mark jie tjoe foekmark jie tjoe foek
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and easy way to have more wifi coverage
reviews.reviewText: I used this product at home to expand my wifi coverage. This is way less expensive than alternative options. I have used other wifi repeaters where the speed of the internet decreased significantly, but I have to say, I have no complaints here. I can watch videos anywhere in the house now.The setup is also super easy. There's a little folder inside with the instructions. It was ready to use within 5 minutes. Also, you get to use the same password from you original wifi. I honestly recommend this great little gadget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received the wifi extender very quick. Install was a breeze. I was able to quickly get it up and running. I have multiple devices connected to the wifi extender. I had few dead spots in my house. Works well with Ring cameras

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Workhorse wifi extender!
reviews.reviewText: What a great little extender! It works really well. I had a blind spot at the back of my house and in my basement, which is where I want to set up my home office, but not anymore!I can now work from home without worrying about my wifi connection not being great.The set up was very easy, you can scan a QR code and there is an easy to follow step by step. The extender was packages very well and arrived super quick. I have comcast and so far its very compatible.If I had any questions, customer service was really fast to respond too!This extender gets a 10/10!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good reach and easy set up
reviews.reviewText: It has a good reach and I loved that it was easy to set it up. My gate is 100 ft away and still is able to connect the gate and Ring to this extender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, easy, and there when I needed it!
reviews.reviewText: Had my Wi-Fi extender go out and I had bought this a backup and for extending my bridge network at some point. Less than a minute of opening the box we were back online. Instructions were very easy to follow and it worked like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Wi-Fi extender
reviews.reviewText: I needed to extend my Wi-fi router into my garage for my workshop. I took it out of the box, plugged it into an outlet and within one minute had connected to my router to be extended and it was up and running. It could not be any easier! Highly recommend.
